text: Song Bum-keun (Hangul: ; Hanja: ; born 15 October 1997) is a South Korean footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors. ==Club career== ===Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors=== On 20 February 2018, Song made his professional debut in 2018 AFC Champions League against Kitchee SC. ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors |2018 |rowspan=3|K League 1 |30||0||0||0||8||0||38||0 |- |2019 |38||0||0||0||8||0||46||0 |- |2020 |23||0||3||0||2||0||28||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !91!!0!!3!!0!!18!!0!!112!!0 |} ==Honours== ===Club=== Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors *K League 1: 2018, 2019 ===International=== South Korea U23 *Asian Games: 2018 *AFC U-23 Championship: 2020 ===Individual=== * AFC U-23 Championship Best Goalkeeper: 2020 ==References== == External links == * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:South Korean footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Korea University alumni Category:Jeonbuk Hyundai Motors FC players Category:K League 1 players Category:South Korea under-20 international footballers Category:South Korea under-23 international footballers Category:Footballers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in football Category:Asian Games gold medalists for South Korea Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
